original_title: MY FIRST STORY - We're Just Waiting 4 You Tour 2016 Final at BUDOKAN
overview: MY FIRST STORY's concert performance "We're Just Waiting 4 You Tour 2016 Final at BUDOKAN" held at Nippon Budokan. It includes the encore and also includes off-shots from the day of the show. This live performance was the final show of their 47 prefectures tour "We're Just Waiting 4 You Tour 2016."
title: MY FIRST STORY - We're Just Waiting 4 You Tour 2016 Final at BUDOKAN
